__e: The point is, you would go to your new position with references from me and from Mrs Hughes and you would not have to refer to your earlier life.
Mrs Hughes and Anna are taking what's left down to Mr Travis tomorrow, milady.
I'll find Mrs Hughes and come back for you.
Mrs Hughes may have told you... I haven't yet.
Mrs Hughes has told me all about you. Thank you, Mrs Crawley.
The fact is, Mrs Hughes is ill, milady.
Father Hughes, who is all good and deserving of my love... .. I firmly resolve to...
Mrs Hughes, I only want to say one thing.
Mrs Hughes, I understand that you're not well.
Mrs Hughes, the last thing I'd wish to be is rude, but in this case I really must be left to my own devices.
